summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/10/24 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: I picked this one up because a little pampering in the shower doesn't hurt.

Pros: - pump top easy to use and proportion
- lovely design
- doesn't tip over when reaching for it
- nice smell

Cons: - doesn't sud up quite as much as I like

With a larger family comes less 'pamper' time...and this one might not be much, but a little extra, lovely odor is a bonus in my life. This one sits well on the edge of the tub/shower and doesn't tip over every time I reach for it. The pump top works well and makes it easy to get soap without fiddling. It smells nice without being overwhelming and doesn't hang forever on the skin. The soap itself doesn't sud up as much as I'd like (can there be enough bubbles?), but it's not bad, either. The spreads easily, doesn't leave any residue or films, doesn't irritate the skin, and washes off without troubles. So, I'm satisfied. Review Title: Cleans and lovely odor Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5 Review Date: 2020/10/30 Store: PalNour Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {} Review Text: Cucumbers are supposed to be amazing for the skin. So, I wanted to give these a go.

Pro: - moisten. Very moist.
- mask doesn't rip or tear
- plastic backing for easier application
- gentle, pleasant aroma
- sinks quickly into skin after massaging at end

Cons: - thin
- hard to slide into place...and then doesn't fit quite right
- suggested wear time is 20-25 mins....longer than usual

These masks come individually packaged in robust and easy to open pouches. The mask has a sturdy, plastic backing, which is the only reason it can be unfolded and placed on without any trouble because these are thin. Surprisingly, they don't rip or tear easily, though. After taking off the backing, it takes a little maneuvering to get these to sit in place. Firstly, the thin material wanted to bunch and roll along the edges of the face, and the lack of thickness made it difficult to get to lay flat. Also, the eye holes aren't quite right. I, my son, and my daughter tried them (each with very different face sizes) and all of us had trouble with the eyes. When they were in position, The bridge of the nose wouldn't stay pressed against the skin, but kept lifting up. The suggested wear time is 20 to 25 minutes, which is longer than the 15 to 20 I normally see on masks. Removing the mask, however, is no problem, and there's a good amount of moisture left over to massage into the skin....which also works well

The masks are moistening and have a gentle, pleasant odor (although I can't really place it). These are refreshing and leave the skin shiny. If only they'd sit better, I'd enjoy them more. Review Title: Moistens Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count Review Date: 2020/11/11 Store: SOOAE Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: A bubble mask was something I hadn't tried yet. So, I was curious.

Pros: - pretty, pink coloring
- quite a bit in package
- goes on easily
- doesn't drip or ooze
- gentle, soapy odor
- fun to have to foam up on face

This comes in the usual, mask, foil pouch and is easy to rip open. The mask-fluid is pinkish and has the appearance of yoghurt. It has a flowery, soapy odor, but this isn't over-powering by any means. It's no problem to spread over the face and doesn't drip or run while doing so. It actually starts to foam the second it hits the skin. This was actually fun to watch (joy in little things) and tingles a bit, too. Even the foam stays in place and doesn't run off of the skin or drip.

It is to be worn for 3 min, and then washed off....like a mud mask (but foam is simply more enjoyable than mud). It rinses off pretty easily and leaves the skin feeling refreshed and a pinkish hue. It's simply a nice experience and a change up from the usual masks and muds. Review Title: Bubbly, quick and fun Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: CARLA Lacto Biome Balancing Cream Skin Care for Sensitive Dry Skin Face Hydrating Moisturizer Review Date: 2021/01/15 Store: NY FASHIONCITY Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NY FASHIONCITY', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '4.3387 Ounce', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'UPC': '191752068773'} Review Text: The cream comes is a white box, light cardboard box with the glass jar inside (this has a white, thick plastic lid. It looks simple and in the elegant direction. Upon opening the lid, there's a plastic cover, which needs to be removed (and tossed). The creams is white and carries a citrus odor. It is smooth and thick enough to easily dip out of the jar with the fingers. It has a definite water-base feel to it.
It spreads onto the skin easily and sinks in relatively quickly. The skin does feel slightly tighter(? I guess I'll call it that) right away. I could tell where I had put the cream on and where not. It moistens the skin, and the citrus smell lingers. I have no trouble putting on make-up afterwards. So, far it seems to be smoothing the skin, but only time will tell how it does on that end. Review Title: Really enjoying it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes Review Date: 2021/01/24 Store: UJM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-010'} Review Text: After hearing several friends praise magnetic eyelashes, I decided to give these a go.
The package goes with 10 pairs of eyelashes, each held into place by a magnetic strip, and each one slightly different than the other. There are two containers of magnetic eye liner and one plastic tweezers.
The eyeliner has a thin brush which makes it simple to paint the black line where it needs to be and keep it straight. I had to go back and re-do the very edges to make sure there was enough to hold the lashes. These are easy to remove from the box with the tweezers and place onto the eyes. I was surprised how well the lashes hold...it's not over grippy but they stay in place as long as you don't knock them around. The felt a bit scratchy along the corner to the nose, although it wasn't really rubbing. This sensation was only slight and soon forgotten.

The eyelashes are easy to remove and place back into the box for re-usage. The eyeliner came off so much easier than I thought it would....with a little warm water. It balls off into tiny chunks and doesn't run or scuff or leave marks behind.

These work better than I thought they might and I will be using them again. Review Title: Stay in place Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Review Date: 2021/03/17 Store: Eye Love Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} Review Text: My son loves charcoal soaps. So, we gave this one a try.

Pros: - smooth
- very pleasant, herbal smell
- Dead Sea mud nice additive
- has a nice, homemade cut

Oddity (but not really a con): - seems to be almost moist although it isn't

This soap has such a pleasant odor in comparison to the usual charcoal soaps my son uses. It also doesn't leave as sticky of a black residue in the shower. It is smooth and soapy, and is very nice on the skin...which I'm assuming has something to do with the Dead Sea mud. The bar isn't factory cut but has a nice, homemade appearance. My son really likes this one quite a bit. Review Title: Pretty good soap Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Black To Grey Ombre Synthetic Wigs Mixed Color Natural Wave Wigs for Women Natural Hairline Lace Long Wig for Daily Use Heat Resistant Hair Replacement Wigs (Ombre grey) Review Date: 2021/10/01 Store: Refined hair Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.04 x 5.94 x 2.09 inches; 9.91 Ounces'} Review Text: We picked this one up for a Halloween costume. It comes packaged in a plastic box, in plastic bags, in a hairnet to make sure it doesn't knot. The hair has an okay quality for its purpose, sits well on the head, and does look like we'd expected. What threw us was that the box claims it's 100% Brazilian hair (what's that?) but it also claims it's made in China. Maybe more knowledge-able wig-wearers will understand that. The hair has a synthetic feel to it and doesn't style quite as well as it could. But, as said, for our purposes it works very well. Review Title: Looks nice and sits well Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed high satisfaction with several purchases, highlighting positive experiences such as effective cleansing, pleasant fragrances, and enjoyable application processes. They appreciate ease of use, with convenient packaging and user-friendly features like pump tops and sturdy backings on masks. Reports indicate that products leave a refreshing feel on the skin, with notable mentions of lovely scents that enhance personal care routines. Users found certain items to provide a nice balance of pampering and functionality, contributing to an overall enjoyable experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Some products triggered mixed feelings, particularly with fit and comfort issues in facial masks that did not adhere properly, affecting overall user enjoyment. Complaints included the thinness of certain masks, leading to a frustrating application experience. Additionally, there were observations regarding texture or effectiveness, such as creams causing a tightening sensation that was unexpected or wigs that felt synthetic and did not meet styling expectations. Queries relating to product descriptions also arose, suggesting potential confusion over material quality.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping behavior suggests a blend of positive and negative experiences. While they enjoyed effective and fragrant products that contributed to their skincare and self-care routines, challenges with fit and texture occasionally detracted from enjoyment. The user displayed a preference for products with ease of use and pleasing sensory experiences, indicating potential for repeat purchases in categories that meet their standards, while remaining cautious of inconsistencies in others.

target_interaction.title: Small yet hold quite a bit and work well
target_interaction.text:
These are perfectly sized for on the go and slide into the little side-pocket of my purse. The container is solid, keeps the soap slices in place (and not in my purse), and is no problem to open and close as needed. The scents between the various colors are noticeable, and each person in the family has their favorite. There are 50 sheets in each container, which slide right out (just don't get it wet!). They dissolve easily in the hand with a bit of rubbing and water, and do leave the hands feeling clean.
My husband especially enjoys them, since he's always on the road. These take up little space, while giving him a chance to clean his hands whenever necessary. I keep it in my purse for those terrible moments when soap isn't available, which doesn't happen very often, but these also hold well.
So, I'm liking them.
target_interaction.title_meta: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party)
features: PORTABLE TRAVEL SIZE -- Each YouClean collection has 3 tiny boxes (2 x 1 x 0.25 inches) (5 x 2.5 x 0.5 cm) which nicely fit in any purse/ wallet, handbag, pack-backs that come in handy everywhere and at any time. These portable soap sheets are small, light and zero-waste which makes them perfect for travel, hiking, camping, school trips and convenient at workplaces.

FOAMING, MOITURIZING & NOURISHING SKIN -- YouClean hand soap sheet quickly dissolves to create a foaming lather. It is made with high quality, all-natural plant-based ingredients, nourish and moisturize your skin with flower/fruit essential oils.

WONDERFUL AROMATHERAPY with ESSENTIAL OILS -- YouClean 8 scent collections will keep your wallet, handbag, pack backs, or pockets smell good all the time. We also have The Nonsense (unscented) which is suitable for professional working environments.

EASY-TO-USE -- Take out a YouClean soap sheet with dry hands. Add water and rub hands to form a lather. Rinse, dry and enjoy your clean hands. It is suitable for all skin types and whole body. It can be used as shampoo or body wash, if needed.
NO PLASTIC PACKAGING with 100% biodegradable paper packaging. We are fighting with the plastic waste by being part of the solution. GREEN EARTH IS OUR GOAL - KEEP YouClean IS YOUR MISSION!
description: Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)

We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases!   Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs.   Check out our 9 scent collections:   - Tea Party  - Citrus Collection  - Purple Heart  - Pink Pamper  - Red Passion  - Blanca Elegance  - Seaside Vacation  - The Adventure  - The Nonsense (unscented)
